body: Public Involvement        Ruins Stabilization Work at Abo NPS/Murt Sullivan       On an ongoing basis, we strive to improve your visitor experience and better and more efficiently preserve your cultural and natural resources at Salinas Pueblo Missions National Monument. This sometimes involves new construction or changing existing structures. We welcome your comments on planned projects. You may use the following link to review planned projects. An invitation for comment and instructions for commenting are included. Link to the Planning, Environment and Public Comment website
title: Salinas Pueblo Missions National Monument: Public Involvement
